Package org.apache.heron.common.basics

Interface ISelectHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CheckpointManagerServer, HeronClient, HeronServer, HeronServerTester.AbstractTestClient, MetricsCacheClient, MetricsCacheManagerServer, MetricsManagerClient, MetricsManagerServer, StreamManagerClient, TManagerClient
    public interface ISelectHandler
    Implementing this interface allows an object to be the callback of SelectServer
